description: Cosy up with the ultimate in comfort food. This healthier green mac 'n' cheese recipe is ultra creamy and loaded with broccoli for a veggie hit.
name: Healthier Mac & Cheese with Broccoli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide pasta mixture among bowls. Top with charred broccoli and parmesan. Season with pepper, then serve.
